trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRowPostPaintEventArgs" /> that contains the event data.
Represents the method that will handle the <see cref="E:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.RowPostPaint" /> event of a <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView" />.
trans-unit.target: 表示将用来处理 <see cref="E:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.RowPostPaint" /> 的 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView" /> 事件的方法。

trans-unit.source: When you create a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRowPostPaintEventHandler> delegate, you identify the method that will handle the event.
trans-unit.target: 创建 <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRowPostPaintEventHandler> 委托时，需要标识将处理该事件的方法。

trans-unit.source: To associate the event with your event handler, add an instance of the delegate to the event.
trans-unit.target: 若要将事件与事件处理程序关联，请将该委托的一个实例添加到事件中。

trans-unit.source: The event handler is called whenever the event occurs, unless you remove the delegate.
trans-unit.target: 除非移除了该委托，否则每当发生该事件时就会调用事件处理程序。

trans-unit.source: For more information about event-handler delegates, see [NIB: Events and Delegates](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/d98fd58b-fa4f-4598-8378-addf4355a115).
trans-unit.target: 有关事件处理程序委托的详细信息，请参阅[NIB： 事件和委托](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/d98fd58b-fa4f-4598-8378-addf4355a115)。

trans-unit.source: The following code example presents a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRowPostPaintEventHandler> delegate that paints textual content that spans the entire row below the normal cell values.
trans-unit.target: 下面的代码示例提供<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRowPostPaintEventHandler>绘制跨越在正常的单元格值下方的整个行的文本内容的委托。

trans-unit.source: This code example is part of a larger example provided in [How to: Customize the Appearance of Rows in the Windows Forms DataGridView Control](~/docs/framework/winforms/controls/customize-the-appearance-of-rows-in-the-datagrid.md).
trans-unit.target: 此代码示例摘自[如何： 自定义 Windows 窗体 DataGridView 控件中的行外观](~/docs/framework/winforms/controls/customize-the-appearance-of-rows-in-the-datagrid.md)。
